# Bioelectric Tracker — Current State v1

**Generated:** 2025-12-10
**Codebase:** TypeScript / Next.js 15
**Generated By:** AI Assistant

## Executive Summary

The Bioelectric Tracker is a specialized wellness application designed to support users through a 4-phase bioelectric regeneration program. It features secure authentication, data-rich dashboarding, daily protocol tracking, and subjective biomarker logging. The application is built on a modern Next.js 15 stack with MongoDB for persistence.

## Technology Stack

- **Framework:** Next.js 15 (App Router)
- **Language:** TypeScript 5.3
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS 3.4
- **Database:** MongoDB (Mongoose ODM)
- **Authentication:** NextAuth.js v4 (with JWT & Credentials)
- **Charts:** Recharts 2.10
- **State Management:** Zustand 5.0

## Project Structure

```
src/
├── app/                 # Next.js App Router pages & API
│   ├── api/             # Backend API routes
│   ├── auth/            # Auth pages (login/register)
│   └── dashboard/       # Main protected application area
├── components/
│   ├── charts/          # Recharts visualizations
│   ├── dashboard/       # Dashboard widgets & layout
│   ├── modalities/      # Modality session components
│   └── ...
├── lib/                 # Shared utilities (db, auth, fetcher)
├── models/              # Mongoose schemas
└── hooks/               # Custom React hooks
```

## Component Inventory (Key)

- **Layouts:** `DashboardLayout`, `ClientProviders`
- **Widgets:** `CurrentPhaseCard`, `ProgressSummaryCard`, `TodaysTasks`
- **Forms:** `ProgressNoteForm`, `ModalitySession`
- **Visualizations:** `BiomarkerCharts`, `PhaseProgress`

## API Endpoints

- `POST /api/auth/[...nextauth]` - Authentication handler
- `GET/POST /api/progress/notes` - Daily journal entries
- `GET/POST /api/modalities/sessions` - Modality usage logging
- `GET /api/phases/current` - Current phase status
- `POST /api/products/log-usage` - Supplement tracking

## Database Collections

- `users` - User profile, phase status, compliance streak
- `phases` - Definition of the 4 program phases
- `products` - Catalog of supplements/protocols
- `productusages` - Daily logs of product compliance
- `modalitysessions` - logs of device usage
- `progressnotes` - Rich text entries + biomarker maps
- `notification` - User alerts and reminders

## Environment Requirements

- `MONGODB_URI` - Connection string
- `NEXTAUTH_SECRET` - JWT signing key
- `NEXTAUTH_URL` - Base URL (for redirects)

## Current Feature Status

| Feature | Status | Notes |
|---------|--------|-------|
| Authentication | ✅ | Working with email/password & bcrypt |
| Dashboard | ✅ | All widgets rendering with skeletons |
| Phase System | ⚠️ | Display works, automatic progression logic is implicit |
| Progress Notes | ✅ | Rich text + Custom Biomarkers working |
| Modality Logger | ✅ | Functional, tracks Spooky/MWO sessions |
| Mobile Responsive | ✅ | Tailwind classes support responsive layout |
